job description:
DATA ANALYSTGathers and documents data requirements / metrics - Tracks data integrity for Accuracy, Completeness, and Data Security Compliance - Analyze data for completeness and follow up with data ingestion process to adjust and update the process accordingly - Documents the detailed logical and physical data models - Performs manual or automated data entry/data clean-up as required and performs mass data imports using the API or a import tools 2+ years of Salesforce implementation experience - Solid understanding the the Salesforce Service Cloud Data Model - Solid data analytical skills in tools like data loader, reporting and analytics and excel crosstabs - Focus to detail and ability to troubleshoot, analyze and resolve data issues in the system - Experience utilizing ETL and ESB technologies on enterprise scale applicationsLocation: Woodlands, TX Duration : 12 months+ - provided by Dice Salesforce , SFDC , Data Analyze
Associated topics: data center, data integrity, data manager, data management, database administrator, etl, erp, mongo database, mongo database administrator, sql
